metas.name: Community
metas.description: Shares the quirky, fast-paced, and character-driven humor of Scrubs and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Another hilarious sitcom with a unique comedic style and ensemble cast, like It's Always Sunny and Scrubs.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy with depth, blending humor with serious themes like Rick and Morty and Futurama.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Dark superhero satire with action and a cynical worldview, similar to the darker aspects of Rick and Morty and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Mystery and suspense with sci-fi elements and corporate intrigue, aligning with All Her Fault, HIS & HERS and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi mystery with complex characters and a compelling plot, much like Stranger Things and Foundation.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and thought-provoking sci-fi themes, similar to Love, Death & Robots and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Gritty and suspenseful drama with mystery elements and complex characters, like The Night Manager and All Her Fault.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Dark comedy with a blend of humor and serious drama, like Brassic and Ted Lasso, and touches of crime.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Optimistic and heartwarming comedy with memorable characters, similar to Scrubs and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with a lighthearted tone and quirky characters, reminiscent of Scrubs and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary-style comedy with a supernatural twist, sharing the humor of It's Always Sunny and the fantasy of Stranger Things.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Absurdist sci-fi comedy with a quirky premise and fast-paced plot, much like Rick and Morty and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British sitcom with dark humor and relatable characters, aligning with the comedic style of It's Always Sunny and Brassic.

metas.name: Taskmaster
metas.description: Hilarious British panel show with absurd challenges, sharing the comedic spirit of Goodness Gracious Me and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a romantic twist, blending humor with futuristic themes, like Futurama and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Intriguing sci-fi thriller with a complex plot and dual realities, much like Foundation and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Dark comedy with a time-loop twist and philosophical themes, aligning with the mind-bending nature of Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: Crime drama with a focus on criminal psychology and suspense, similar to The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on the classic detective with compelling mysteries and strong performances, like The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: Supernatural action-adventure with a dysfunctional family and a unique visual style, akin to Stranger Things and Fallout.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: Darkly comedic action series with surreal elements and a unique visual style, like Rick and Morty and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Surreal and mind-bending dramedy with sci-fi elements and strong performances, similar to Love, Death & Robots.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: Animated series with a unique visual style and a mind-bending story about reality and perception, like Love, Death & Robots and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Devs
metas.description: Atmospheric and suspenseful sci-fi thriller with philosophical themes, like Foundation and Black Mirror.

metas.name: Preacher
metas.description: Darkly comedic and violent adaptation of the comic book series, similar to Rick and Morty and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with complex characters, political intrigue, and high stakes, similar to Foundation and Fallout.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: Sci-fi drama with time travel and moral dilemmas, like Doctor Who and Stranger Things.

metas.name: Better Off Ted
metas.description: Satirical workplace comedy with absurd humor and a unique visual style, similar to Scrubs and Arrested Development.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: British sitcom with surreal humor and pop culture references, aligning with the style of Scrubs and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Mythic Quest
metas.description: Workplace comedy set in a video game studio, combining humor with relatable character dynamics, like Scrubs and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated space opera with dark humor and surprisingly emotional moments, blending Rick and Morty with Futurama.

metas.name: Altered Carbon
metas.description: Cyberpunk science fiction with lots of action, crime and mystery elements.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: A thrilling cat-and-mouse chase between a spy and an assassin, with moments of dark humour.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: A gripping drama following a young chess prodigy, with elements of mystery and suspense.

metas.name: Attack on Titan
metas.description: This anime series is a great mix of action, mystery, and sci-fi, blending the best aspects of shows like Fallout, and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
metas.description: Thematic parallels with Doctor Who's sci-fi themes, and One-Punch Man's action.

metas.name: Code Geass
metas.description: Great action, sci-fi and thriller elements, mirroring Doctor Who.

metas.name: Babylon 5
metas.description: Babylon 5 features a deep story with excellent character development.
